changelog.zh:
- 新增：VOD/回放内容进度条显示功能（支持自动检测/始终显示/从不显示三种模式）
- 新增：TV端长按左右键快进快退功能，速度递增（5秒→10秒→15秒...最高50秒/次）
- 优化：TV端快捷键布局，双击左键显示分类面板，短按左右键切换源
- 优化：进度条可通过遥控器拖动，支持实时预览
- 修复：Android TV原生播放器进度条显示逻辑
- 优化：更新底部快捷键说明文字
changelog.en:
- Added: Progress bar for VOD/replay content (supports auto-detect/always show/never show modes)
- Added: TV long-press left/right keys for seek with accelerating speed (5s→10s→15s...up to 50s/time)
- Improved: TV shortcut key layout, double-click left for category panel, short-press left/right for source switching
- Improved: Progress bar draggable with remote control, supports real-time preview
- Fixed: Android TV native player progress bar display logic
- Improved: Updated bottom shortcut key hints
